title: Podcast Episode 39.2 – ROUGH SKETCH by Kate Canterbary
description:
Our audiobook this week is ROUGH SKETCH by USA Today Bestselling Author Kate Canterbary! 



Narrated by Christian Fox and Savannah Peachwood 



Smart, successful, and sitting pretty at the top of her game, Neera Malik has it all figured out. Save for the small issue of Gustavo Guillmand.



The artist with a cult—and Instagram—following has a problem and it's not his preference for shirtless selfies.



No, he has an attitude problem, a minding his own business problem, an infuriatingly sexy problem.



They can't stand each other and they can't stay away from each other.



ROUGH SKETCH by Kate Canterbary (ebook preorder): https://bit.ly/2LwjDQq



The Walsh Series by Kate Canterbary (Kindle Unlimited): https://amzn.to/2JTO3sx



FRESH CATCH by Kate Canterbary: https://amzn.to/2xVcmRo



MAGNOLIA CHRONICLES by Kate Canterbary: https://amzn.to/30H7QSP



Kate Canterbary Website: http://katecanterbary.com



Giveaway! https://bit.ly/2LwjDQq



UNTIL HER by Aurora Rose Reynolds: https://amzn.to/2LwCydP



THIS IS WILD by Natasha Madison: https://amzn.to/2SpB2uN



Follow Read Me Romance on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/readmeromance/?hl=en



Join Read Me Romance Headquarters on FB: https://www.facebook.com/groups/1681258945313004/



Find Alexa Riley on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/authoralexariley/



Find Tessa Bailey on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/tessabaileyisanauthor/



Podcast CreditsRead Me Romance Theme Song by L.B. Ballard https://m.facebook.com/lbballardmusic/Podcast Production by Lola
